page.title: 14THE HOSPITAL
page.content: Farnborough Common Road is a rather built-up area dominated by Farnborough Hospital.There are also some new houses ng built. The 261 is a regular bus service,and there is also a coach service with the numbers 705 and 706. The speed limit is forty miles per hour, as it is a main road,it is rather busy. outside Farnborough Hospital there is a pillar box and a telephone box.The number of the telephone box is 52025. Further along near Crofton Road there is a pub called the Olde Whyte Lyon and Police Station.It is a Metropolitan Police Station and is open from 8 am until 10 pm.We then turned into Crofton Road where there are many shops and there are also Building Societies and a Mobil Petrol station. Sainsburys is a newly built supermarket
